alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Gonzales; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 12:26AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gonzales, Fayette and Lavaca Counties through 130 AM CST... At 1226 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yoakum, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Yoakum, La Grange, Schulenburg, Hallettsville, Shiner, Flatonia, Moulton, Fayetteville, Round Top, Sublime, Muldoon, Ezzell, Speaks, Carmine, Komensky, Swiss Alp, Henkhaus, Rutersville, and Ledbetter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
